description:
TechForge recently caught up with Gil Pekelman, CEO of all-in-one IT management platform, Atera, to discuss how AI is becoming the IT professionals’ number one companion. Can you tell us a little bit about Atera and what it does? We launched the Atera all-in-one platform for IT management in 2016, so quite a few years... Read more »

The post Gil Pekelman, Atera: How businesses can harness the power of AI appeared first on AI News.
title: Gil Pekelman, Atera: How businesses can harness the power of AI
